environment.GUI.views

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • environment.GUI.views.CommandLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulatorView<Station>

    public final class CommandLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulatorView<Station>
    The CommandLine class displays information of the simulation via the Console (System.out).

    The CommandLine class implements the SimulationView interface to allows for the status of simulation to be printed to the console using System.out.

    Cannot be extended.

    Since:
    08/03/2017
    Version:
    13/04/2017
    Author:
    John_Berg, Joshua_Eddy

    • Field Detail

      • COMMANDLINE

        private static final CommandLine COMMANDLINE
        The single instance of CommandLine.
        See Also:
        CommandLine

      • end

        private boolean end
        Represents whether the CommandLine should display the final more detailed view of the Station. When this is set to false, this SimulatorView will display the real time tick details but if this is set to true then the SimulatorView will display the final view.
        See Also:
        Station, Simulator

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLine

        private CommandLine()
        Create a new CommandLine object.

        Initialise an instance of the CommandLine class, which allows for the status of a simulation to be displayed via the console.

    • Method Detail

      • show

        public final void show(int time,
                       Station station)
        Print the information of a simulation, including the time elapsed in the simulation and the status of the simulation's status.
        Specified by:
        show in interface SimulatorView<Station>
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time that the simulation has been running.
        station - The station to be represented.

      • setEnd

        public final void setEnd()
        Description copied from interface: SimulatorView
        Set the SimulatorView to terminate.

        Flag the SimulatorView to terminate either when:

        • This method is called
        • When the SimulatorView has finished execution

        Specified by:
        setEnd in interface SimulatorView<Station>
